title: AI Literacy Basics
summary: Intro to what AI is and where students encounter it.

title: Binary Basics
summary: Binary place values and converting binary to denary.

title: What Is Technology? A Digital Literacy Foundation Lesson
summary: Introduce technology as tools people make to help them in everyday life.

title: Foundation lesson: defining technology accurately
summary: Define technology accurately as human-designed tools and systems that solve problems.

summary: Distinguish digital from non-digital technology and explain why Computing focuses on digital systems.

title: What Is a System?
summary: Understand systems as connected parts with inputs, processes and outputs.
